data.description: As the current manager of the Casino Engineering team at KingMakers, a leading iGaming operator in the African market, I oversee the development and expansion of our renowned BetKing and SuperSportBet brands. With the company's strategic plans for market expansion, my role involves transforming our single-market Casino product into a versatile, multi-market, and multi-brand platform. Additionally, I lead and mentor the Casino Engineering team, ensuring the delivery of a scalable and high-performance product.

data.position: Web Developer / Technical Product Owner / Engineering Manager
data.description: Raketech, a leading iGaming affiliate in the European market with products in the US and Japan, provided me with a platform to hone and develop my skills in Engineering Management. Beginning as a WordPress Developer, I swiftly advanced to working on their core sports data service, which underpins the company's Sports affiliate products. I then took on the role of managing the Engineering team for their award-winning Affiliation Cloud platform, a sub-affiliate B2B system that has garnered industry acclaim. To improve delivery efficiency, I introduced Scrum to the Affiliation Cloud team and successfully coordinated integration initiatives with the platform.
